text: Dad is an extinct town in Carbon County, Wyoming. A post office called Dad was established in 1910, and remained in operation until 1940. The origin of the name "Dad" is obscure. It is believed that it is named after A.T. Dad Corlett, a rancher who lived in the area.Annals of Wyoming 14:3 ==References== Category:Ghost towns in Wyoming Category:Landforms of Carbon County, Wyoming Category:1910 establishments in the United States
title: Dad, Wyoming
